frontPage1.title: Meet the new Studio Pro, DUDE ! !
frontPage1.subtitle: Version 2.0 of the Studio Pro theme for the Genesis Framework

frontPage2.leftContent: Easy to personalize with plenty of color and layout settings in the Customizer
